text: 19.45 Where transport assessments are required, they should be accompanied by an Active Travel Zone (ATZ) assessment. The ATZ should identify and assess key routes to major trip attractors, using latest TfL guidance. It should also consider evening/night-time use, and the safety of marginalised or vulnerable groups, including women, girls and gender diverse people, children and older people, and people with disabilities. 19.46 Applicants should submit a travel plan alongside the planning application, where appropriate.
